full_summary:
EN929-230111-2: RISO Document Printing Services
=============================================

### Tender Announcement

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Receiver General of Canada, has issued a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) to procure document printing services for the Imaging and Receiver General of Canada in Matane, Quebec, Canada.

### Document Printing Services

The RFSO seeks to establish a standing offer for document printing services, as detailed in Annex A.

### Tender Details

*   **Reference Number**:  WS3788625100-Doc3834915342
*   **Publication Date**: 19 January 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 3 February 2023, 2 PM EST
*   **Tender Status**: Expiring
*   **Procurement Category**: Service Request

### Selection Criteria

The tender will be awarded to the bidder offering the **lowest price**.

### Contact Information

Contact Information:

*   **Name**: Annie Deslauriers
*   **Title**: SPAC/PSPC
*   **Email Address**: <annie.deslauriers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*   **Country**: Canada


Notice:
The bid solicitation number Doc3791619574-EN929-230111 dated 15 December 2022, with a closing of 13 January 2023 at 2 PM EST, is hereby cancelled and superseded. A debriefing session will be provided upon request to bidders who bid on the previous solicitation.

The complete tender notice, including Annex A, is available online at the following URL:

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15177100?extsite=MTUxNzcxMDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Additional information and supporting documentation must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on 3 February 2023. Bids submitted after 2 PM EST will be declared non-responsive.sembled  annotation ld Lets change that i 425
